
---
title: "Extension"
title_tag: "Resource Extension | Package PostgreSQL"
meta_desc: "Explore the Extension resource of the PostgreSQL package, including examples, input properties, output properties, lookup functions, and supporting types. The ``postgresql..Extension`` resource creates and manages an extension on a PostgreSQL"
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The ``postgresql..Extension`` resource creates and manages an extension on a PostgreSQL
server.


## Usage

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as postgresql from "@pulumi/postgresql";

const myExtension = new postgresql.Extension("my_extension", {});
```

### Inputs

The Extension resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/programming-model#outputs" >}}) properties:

{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Database</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Which database to create the extension on. Defaults to provider database.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The name of the extension.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Schema</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Sets the schema of an extension.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Version</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Sets the version number of the extension.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
